title: Average attendance of the main football leagues in Europe 2018 to 2019
yAxis: Average attendance in thousands of people
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing League Name, and a y axis representing Average attendance in thousands of people.
The highest category is found at Bundesliga_(Germany) where Average attendance in thousands of people is 42.7.
The lowest category is found at Ligue_1_(France) where Average attendance in thousands of people is 22.1.
